title: Fyfjur BBQ Cleaning Wire Brush, Bbq Cleaner, grill brush, BBQ Oven Cleaner, 2 in 1 Pointed Tail Wire BBQ Brush + Stainless Steel Curl Grill Brush Barbecue Cleaning Kit(Black)
features: High-quality material: High-quality stainless steel bbq cleaning kit is made of high-quality steel wire and PE handle. The stainless steel barbecue brush is hard and durable, rust-proof, anti-corrosion, and thoroughly cleaned, which completely solves the trouble of cleaning after barbecue.
Ingenious design: Each stainless steel bbq wire brush for grill cleaning brush has a hard scraper, which can effectively remove grease, dirt and food residues without scratching the grill.
Effective cleaning: This stainless steel bbq cleaning brush can effectively remove grease, dirt, residue, thoroughly clean the grill, and keep the grill shiny.

Wide application: Our bbq accessories can not only be used in various grills, such as gas grills, smoked grills, charcoal grills, iron grills, and other metal grills, but also suitable for frying pans.

Two in one package: You will get a multi-function barbecue brush for grill for pointed tail steel wire and a stainless steel curling cleaning brush, a 2-in-1 cleaning kit. There are 2 PCS bbq cleaning brushes in the package.
description: Product Description Features Our bbq cleaning kit combine with grill scrapers to clean your grill quickly, deeply and efficiently every time you use it. Whether you cook with gas, electric, charcoal or cast iron, you need an efficient bbq cleaning brush that keeps your grill grate clear of food debris. Ergonomic handle provides control and leverage when cleaning dirty cook grates. The unit’s long, soft-touch handle protects hands from heat and burns. Package Includes: 1 x Wire Barbecue Brush, 1 x Curled Stainless Steel Brush The video showcases the product in use. The video guides you through product setup. The video compares multiple products. Easy to Store Handle end hanging hole design, easy storage and hang. The handle is smooth and comfortable to hold. Stainless Steel bbq Bristles Equipped with sturdy stainless steel wire brush bbq bristles, the bbq brush removes grill residue and stains with ease, even the smallest spaces. Non-Slip Handle The tail handle is comfortable to grip, bumpy and non-slip, and it is a good helper for barbecue cleaning. Stainless Steel Shovel Blade The brush is made of plastic and stainless steel, which can brush the head of barbecue residue stains, and the shovel blade can scrape thick stains. Multifunctional Bbq Cleaning Kit Wire Barbecue Brush Curly Hair Barbecue Brush 3-in-1 Versatility Material 430 shovel + 201 steel wire + plastic Material Stainless steel wire + galvanized twisted wire + plastic Advantage 1 This bbq cleaning brush combines a scraper, bristle brush, and grill scraper Features Grill brush combined with grill scraper gives you the convenience of two in one. Features The 201 stainless steel bbq cleaner kit head can easily clean the dead corners. Advantage 2 Effortlessly tackle grease, grime, and stubborn stains Manual For BBQ Brush'S Long Life! Previous page Step 1 Heat the grill, then use the grill scraper and wire bbq brush to gently scrape off the dirt and oil stains on the grill; Learn More Step 2 Fill a small container with hot water, soak the grill cleaning brush in the water for one minute after cleaning to prevent grease from sticking to the brushes. Learn More Step 3 Wipe the grill with a clean damp cloth to remove any residue to keep the grill free of dust, stain. Learn More Next page
